member.name: T:Fable.Cli.BuildalyzerCrackerResolver
member.summary: Use Buildalyzer to invoke MSBuild and get F# compiler args from an .fsproj file. As we'll merge this later with other projects we'll only take the sources and the references, checking if some .dlls correspond to Fable libraries

member.name: T:Fable.Cli.FileWatcher.DotnetFileWatcher
member.summary: A FileSystemWatcher wrapper that implements the IFileSystemWatcher interface.

member.name: T:Fable.Cli.FileWatcher.ResetablePollingFileWatcher
member.summary: A wrapper around the immutable polling watcher, implementing IFileSystemWatcher with its mutable BasePath.

member.name: P:Fable.Cli.FileWatcher.PollingFileWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Defaults to false. Must be set to true to start raising events.

member.name: P:Fable.Cli.FileWatcher.PollingFileWatcher.EnableRaisingEvents
member.summary: Defaults to false. Must be set to true to start raising events.

member.name: T:Fable.Cli.FileWatcher.PollingFileWatcher
member.summary: An alternative file watcher based on polling. ignoredDirectoryNameRegexes allows ignoring directories to improve performance.
